branding.name: Aladdin Shawarma
branding.description: Experience the magic of traditional Middle Eastern cuisine with our carefully crafted shawarmas, made with the finest ingredients and time-honored recipes.

hero.description: Discover the authentic taste of the Middle East with our traditional shawarmas, crafted with premium ingredients and centuries-old recipes that transport you to the heart of Arabian cuisine.

about.title: The Magic Behind Aladdin Shawarma
about.subtitle: Bringing Authentic Middle Eastern Flavors to Your Table
about.description: Founded with a passion for authentic Middle Eastern cuisine, Aladdin Shawarma has been serving the community with traditional flavors and warm hospitality. Our journey began with a simple mission: to share the rich culinary heritage of the Middle East through carefully crafted dishes that honor time-tested recipes.

highlights.title: Premium Ingredients
highlights.description: We source only the finest, freshest ingredients to ensure authentic flavors in every bite.

highlights.title: Traditional Methods
highlights.description: Our recipes have been passed down through generations, preserving the authentic taste of the Middle East.

highlights.title: Halal Certified
highlights.description: All our meats are halal certified, ensuring quality and adherence to Islamic dietary laws.

menu.title: Our Delicious Menu
menu.subtitle: Authentic Middle Eastern Flavors
menu.description: Explore our carefully curated selection of traditional Middle Eastern dishes, each prepared with authentic spices and premium ingredients.

items.name: Classic Chicken Shawarma
items.description: Tender marinated chicken with fresh vegetables, tahini sauce, and our special blend of Middle Eastern spices

items.name: Lamb Shawarma Supreme
items.description: Premium lamb cuts marinated in traditional spices, served with hummus, pickles, and garlic sauce

items.name: Mixed Meat Shawarma
items.description: Perfect combination of chicken and lamb with fresh herbs, vegetables, and our signature sauces

items.name: Vegetarian Falafel Wrap
items.description: Crispy homemade falafel with fresh vegetables, tahini, and Mediterranean spices

items.name: Traditional Hummus
items.description: Creamy chickpea blend with tahini, olive oil, and aromatic spices

items.name: Crispy Falafel (6 pcs)
items.description: Golden fried chickpea balls with herbs and Middle Eastern spices

items.name: Fattoush Salad
items.description: Fresh mixed greens with tomatoes, cucumbers, and crispy pita chips

items.name: Fresh Mint Lemonade
items.description: Refreshing blend of fresh mint, lemon, and sparkling water

items.name: Turkish Coffee
items.description: Traditional strong coffee served with a touch of cardamom

chef.title: Meet Our Master Chef
chef.subtitle: The Culinary Artist Behind Every Dish

chef.name: Ahmad Al-Masri
chef.title: Head Chef & Owner
chef.description: Chef Ahmad brings over two decades of culinary expertise from the heart of the Middle East. Trained in traditional kitchens of Damascus and Beirut, he combines authentic recipes with modern techniques to create unforgettable dining experiences.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.comment: Absolutely authentic! The flavors transported me straight to the Middle East. The chicken shawarma is perfectly seasoned and the bread is incredibly fresh.

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.comment: I've been coming here for 3 years and the quality never disappoints. The lamb shawarma is my favorite - tender, flavorful, and always consistent.

reviews.name: Amira Al-Rashid
reviews.comment: As someone from the Middle East, I can confirm this is as authentic as it gets. The spices, the preparation, everything is perfect. Highly recommended!

reviews.name: David Martinez
reviews.comment: The best shawarma in the city! Fresh ingredients, generous portions, and the staff is incredibly friendly. This place has become our go-to for Middle Eastern food.

posts.title: The Art of Perfect Shawarma Marinade
posts.excerpt: Discover the secrets behind our signature marinades that make our shawarma irresistibly delicious.
posts.author: Chef Ahmad Al-Masri

posts.title: A Journey Through Middle Eastern Spices
posts.excerpt: Explore the rich world of Middle Eastern spices and how they transform simple ingredients into culinary magic.
posts.author: Fatima Hassan

posts.title: The History of Shawarma: From Street Food to Gourmet
posts.excerpt: Learn about the fascinating history of shawarma and how it evolved from humble street food to a global phenomenon.
posts.author: Omar Khalil

callToAction.title: Ready to Experience Authentic Middle Eastern Flavors?
callToAction.subtitle: Order now and taste the difference that authentic ingredients and traditional recipes make

perfectIngredients.title: Perfect Ingredients
perfectIngredients.subtitle: The Secret to Our Authentic Taste
perfectIngredients.description: We carefully source the finest ingredients from trusted suppliers who share our commitment to quality and authenticity.

ingredients.name: Premium Lamb
ingredients.description: Locally sourced, grass-fed lamb marinated in traditional spices

ingredients.name: Fresh Herbs
ingredients.description: Daily fresh parsley, mint, and cilantro for that authentic flavor

ingredients.name: Artisan Bread
ingredients.description: House-made pita bread baked fresh throughout the day

ingredients.name: Traditional Spices
ingredients.description: Imported spice blends from the Middle East for authentic taste

reservation.title: Make a Reservation
reservation.subtitle: Reserve Your Table for an Unforgettable Dining Experience
reservation.description: Book your table in advance to ensure the best dining experience. We accommodate groups of all sizes.

footer.description: Aladdin Shawarma has been serving authentic Middle Eastern cuisine with passion and dedication. Visit us for an unforgettable culinary journey.
